类 LLE

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeDBIT.index.algorithms.LLE

  • public class LLE
extends java.lang.Object
    Locally Linear Embedding(LLE), using the Colt library.
    版本:
    2012.03.30
    作者:
    Kewei Ma

        public static cern.colt.matrix.DoubleMatrix2D runLLE(cern.colt.matrix.DoubleMatrix2D matrix,

        compute LLE on distance matrix and output the matrix of eigenvector
        参数:
        distance - matrix
        number - of pivots
        返回:
        matrix of eigenvector

        public static int[] selectFromResult(cern.colt.matrix.DoubleMatrix2D matrix,
                     cern.colt.matrix.DoubleMatrix2D evMatrix)
        Select some of the axes as pivots according to the angle between them , no duplicate axes will be selected.
        参数:
        the - original distance matrix
        matrix - of eigenvector from runLLE
        返回:
